Name: Empty
Description:
Your chocobo is not carrying a race item.
Open a treasure coffer on the course to obtain one.

Name: Stamina Tablet
Description: Prevents stamina reduction for 10 seconds. If stamina is zero, a small amount is restored.

Name: Sprint Shoes
Description: Summons a quick burst of speed.

Name: Choco Aether
Description: Allows a previously used race ability to be executed again.

Name: Bacchus's Water
Description: Sends the forerunning chocobo into a Frenzied state.

Name: Graviball
Description: Afflicts the forerunning chocobo with Heavy.

Name: Briar Caltrop
Description: Surrounds your chocobo with a ring of thorns which will sap the stamina of any chocobos that enter.

Name: Hero Tonic
Description: Invigorates your chocobo for 15 seconds, increasing its overall performance while nullifying any enfeeblements.

Name: Choco Meteor
Description: Summons a meteor from the heavens to wreak havoc on all other chocobos.

Name: Stamina Swapper
Description: Interchanges your chocobo's stamina with that of a forerunning chocobo. Swap is made only if the forerunning chocobo has more stamina than yours.

Name: Spiderweb
Description: Renders the chocobo running immediately behind you unable to use items.
